title: The Split
description: The remote Antarctic island of South Georgia is about to send off its last boat of the summer--which signifies safety to resident glaciologist Felicity Lloyd. She took a job on this isolated island to hide from him, but now that he's out of prison, having served a term for murder, she knows he wonâ€™t give up until he finds her. A doctor digging into the background of Felicity and Freddie's relationship back in Cambridge learns that she has been on the edge for a long time. Heading to South Georgia to try to get to her first is the only way he can think of to help her.
author: Sharon J. Bolton
